title: KubeSkills Daily
description: Play with KubeSkills Daily and learn Kubernetes

items.title: Day 1 - Pod Restart Policies
items.description: Test how Kubernetes handles failures and restarts

items.title: Day 2 - StatefulSet Pod Ordering
items.description: Break ordered updates and compare OrderedReady vs Parallel management

items.title: Day 3 - OOMKilled vs Resource Limits
items.description: Trigger OOM events and compare Kubernetes QoS classes

items.title: Day 4 - Network Policy Lockouts
items.description: Enforce default deny, poke DNS/web holes, and recover access

items.title: Day 5 - Taints and Tolerations
items.description: Evict pods with NoExecute, compare tolerations, and explore NoSchedule

items.title: Day 6 - Liveness Probe Death Loops
items.description: Trigger, inspect, and fix misconfigured probes plus readiness/startup

items.title: Day 7 - Init Container Failures
items.description: Debug stuck init containers, add retries, and run sidecars

items.title: Day 8 - PVC Binding Failures
items.description: Storage that never arrives until you fix StorageClasses and modes

items.title: Day 9 - ConfigMap Updates - The Sync Gap
items.description: See why env vars freeze, volumes lag, and subPath never refreshes

items.title: Day 10 - Secret Rotation - Hot Swapping Credentials
items.description: Rotate secrets, see env/volume drift, and force rollouts to reload

items.title: Day 11 - Service DNS Propagation Delays
items.description: Watch DNS timing gaps, endpoint readiness, and headless vs ClusterIP behavior

items.title: Day 12 - HPA Thrashing - The Scale Storm
items.description: See aggressive HPAs thrash, tune behaviors, and test multi-metric scenarios

items.title: Day 13 - PodDisruptionBudgets - Blocking Maintenance
items.description: See how strict PDBs block drains, fix budgets, and explore conflict scenarios

items.title: Day 14 - ResourceQuota - Deployment Denied
items.description: See how quotas silently block pods, use LimitRanges, and explore scoped/count quotas

items.title: Day 15 - Ingress Path Routing - Order Matters
items.description: See how Prefix ordering, Exact, regex, and rewrites change nginx-ingress routing

items.title: Day 16 - RBAC Lockout - Permission Denied
items.description: See how Roles, ClusterRoles, bindings, and aggregation grant or deny access

items.title: Day 17 - Admission Webhooks - The Deployment Blocker
items.description: See how webhook failures stall the API server and how to bypass, scope, and debug them

items.title: Day 18 - CronJob Concurrency - The Job Pile-Up
items.description: See how CronJob concurrency policies affect overlapping runs, skips, replacements, and history

items.title: Day 19 - ServiceAccount Tokens - Projection Problems
items.description: See how automount settings, projected tokens, and token requests change Kubernetes auth

items.title: Day 20 - Node NotReady - The Eviction Cascade
items.description: See how NotReady taints trigger evictions, tolerations delay them, and workloads recover

items.title: Day 21 - Finalizers - The Deletion Blocker
items.description: See how finalizers block deletion, how to clear them safely, and how built-ins protect resources

items.title: Day 22 - Image Pull Secrets - Authentication Failures
items.description: See how private registry pulls fail, fix secrets, attach via ServiceAccounts, and debug pull errors

items.title: Day 23 - CNI Plugin Failures - Network Isolation
items.description: Inspect CNI configs, test pod connectivity, DNS, NetworkPolicies, MTU, CIDR exhaustion, and CNI errors

items.title: Day 24 - kube-proxy Modes - Service Routing Breakdown
items.description: Inspect kube-proxy mode, test ClusterIP/NodePort routing, iptables rules, scaling, session affinity, and failures

items.title: Day 25 - etcd Performance - The Cluster Heartbeat
items.description: Check etcd health, size, keys, load impact, compaction/defrag, backups, alarms, and metrics

items.title: Day 26 - Kubelet Eviction - Resource Pressure
items.description: Inspect node capacity and thresholds, see QoS/priority eviction order, trigger pressure, and verify recovery

items.title: Day 27 - API Server Rate Limiting - Request Throttling
items.description: Inspect APF configs, flood the API, watch throttling, review FlowSchemas/PriorityLevels, and test identities/metrics

items.title: Day 28 - Pod Security Admission - Policy Enforcement
items.description: Test baseline vs restricted PSA, fix security contexts, observe warn/audit, and validate workloads

items.title: Day 29 - Custom Resource Definitions - Validation Failures
items.description: Iterate from permissive CRDs to strict validation, defaults, status subresources, and multiple versions

items.title: Day 30 - Operator Reconciliation - Infinite Loops
items.description: See how naive controller logic loops forever and how status subresources, observedGeneration, owner refs, and backoff stop the storm

items.title: Day 31 - Helm Charts - Template Rendering Failures
items.description: Debug Helm templates: syntax errors, nil pointers, required values, value precedence, functions, lint, dry-run, upgrades, and rollbacks

items.title: Day 32 - ArgoCD Sync - Out of Sync Nightmares
items.description: Install ArgoCD, sync a repo, watch drift, auto-sync/self-heal, prune, hooks, waves, health checks, replace, selective sync, and rollback

items.title: Day 33 - Service Mesh - Traffic Split Gone Wrong
items.description: Install Istio, split traffic between versions, debug weights, missing subsets, headers, retries/timeouts, and analyze routing issues

items.title: Day 34 - Multi-Tenancy - Namespace Isolation Breakdown
items.description: Create tenant namespaces, quotas, RBAC, apps, network isolation, PSA, LimitRanges, and enforce cross-namespace boundaries

items.title: Day 35 - Init Container Dependencies - Circular Deadlocks
items.description: Build circular init waits, debug deadlocks, fix by breaking the cycle, add timeouts, retries, readiness vs init, Jobs, and StatefulSets

items.title: Day 36 - Jobs and CronJobs - Backoff Explosion
items.description: Trigger failing Jobs to see backoff, cap retries, set deadlines, tune completions and parallelism, suspend/resume, and manage CronJobs

items.title: Day 37 - Volume Mounts - Permission Denied Chaos
items.description: Explore volume permissions: emptyDir vs hostPath, fsGroup fixes, read-only mounts, subPath quirks, PVC access, shared volumes, Secrets, projected volumes, and securityContext overrides

items.title: Day 38 - DNS Resolution - CoreDNS Breakdown
items.description: Break and restore CoreDNS, inspect pod DNS config, tune ndots/timeouts, compare dnsPolicy, tweak CoreDNS, test caching, block/allow DNS, and resolve headless services

items.title: Day 39 - Resource Contention - QoS Eviction Wars
items.description: Launch pods across QoS classes, trigger memory pressure, observe evictions, apply priorities, quotas, LimitRanges, throttling, and finalizers

items.title: Day 40 - Certificates - Expiration Catastrophe
items.description: Inspect control plane certs, install cert-manager, issue short-lived and CA certs, simulate expirations and failed renewals, and debug TLS secrets

items.title: Day 41 - Prometheus Metrics - Missing Targets
items.description: Install Prometheus Operator, create Prometheus selectors, break and fix ServiceMonitors via labels/ports/policies/relabeling, add PodMonitor, and debug missing targets

items.title: Day 42 - Logging Pipelines - Lost in Transit
items.description: Ship logs with Fluent Bit, trigger parser errors, buffer pressure, destination failures, multiline issues, and sidecar patterns to see how logs vanish or get enriched

items.title: Day 43 - Distributed Tracing - Missing Spans
items.description: Install Jaeger, send traces with and without propagation, explore sampling, missing instrumentation, collector pressure, baggage, and slow spans to find trace gaps

items.title: Day 44 - Resource Metrics - Debugging Slow Pods
items.description: Verify metrics-server, stress CPU/memory/I-O, observe throttling and OOM, compare QoS, query raw metrics, drive contention, and autoscale from metrics

items.title: Day 45 - kubectl debug - Ephemeral Container Debugging
items.description: Attach ephemeral debug containers, copy pods, debug nodes, and troubleshoot pods without shells or in CrashLoop using kubectl debug

items.title: Day 46 - Probe Tuning - The Goldilocks Problem
items.description: Tune startup, liveness, and readiness probes; prevent premature restarts, manage readiness routing, and understand probe overhead and rolling update protections

items.title: Day 47 - StatefulSets - Orphaned Volume Nightmare
items.description: See how StatefulSets retain PVCs, handle scale down/up, use retention policies, expand PVCs, manage updates, and clean up orphaned storage

items.title: Day 48 - Cluster Upgrades - Version Skew Chaos
items.description: Inspect versions, deprecated APIs, CRD compatibility, skew policies, webhook versions, storage versions, and draft a safe upgrade plan

items.title: Day 49 - Backup & Restore - Velero Disasters
items.description: Install Velero with MinIO, back up and delete a namespace, restore it, note emptyDir/PVC gaps without snapshots, handle conflicts, hooks, schedules, exclusions, and storage checks

items.title: Day 50 - Node Failures - Eviction Storm Chaos
items.description: Cordon, drain, taint, and recover nodes; observe evictions, PDB blocks, StatefulSet stuck pods, DaemonSet tolerance, and custom tolerations to tune failover

items.title: Day 51 - API Server Overload - Rate Limit Hell
items.description: Hammer the API server, observe APF queues, build custom FlowSchemas/PriorityLevels, simulate webhook slowness, and plan safe rate/priority configs

items.title: Day 52 - etcd Corruption - Quorum Loss Disaster
items.description: Check etcd health/members/size, snapshot and restore, compact/defrag, monitor alarms/metrics, stress etcd, and document disaster recovery

items.title: Day 53 - Network Partitions - Split-Brain Nightmare
items.description: Model network partitions with NetworkPolicies, observe split-brain symptoms, test quorum-based apps, and plan detection and mitigation

items.title: Day 54 - Certificate Rotation - Auto-Renewal Gone Wrong
items.description: Check Kubernetes and cert-manager certs, create short-lived certs, break renewals, monitor expirations, verify chains, and document rotation/DR plans

items.title: Day 55 - RBAC Misconfigurations - Permission Denied Hell
items.description: Probe missing verbs, namespace scope, resourceNames, subresources, aggregation, impersonation, and least-privilege RBAC patterns

items.title: Day 56 - Resource Exhaustion - Cluster at Capacity
items.description: Explore pending pods, fragmentation, preemption, quotas, LimitRanges, and capacity planning under resource pressure

items.title: Day 57 - Pod Security Standards - Enforcement Failures
items.description: Compare PSA profiles and modes, common violations, and compliant workload patterns

items.title: Day 58 - Ingress Failures - Traffic Not Routing
items.description: Install ingress-nginx and debug class, backend, TLS, path, and annotation misconfigurations

items.title: Day 59 - Webhook Timeouts - Admission Controller Chaos
items.description: Explore webhook timeouts, failure policies, selectors, and recovery patterns

items.title: Day 60 - Custom Controllers - Reconciliation Loop Hell
items.description: Explore broken reconciliation loops, conflicts, retries, and recovery patterns

items.title: Day 61 - Helm Chart Failures - Deployment Gone Wrong
items.description: Debug Helm template errors, hooks, dependencies, upgrades, and rollbacks

items.title: Day 62 - CNI Plugin Failures - Networking Goes Dark
items.description: Check CNI configs, pod networking, IP exhaustion, NetworkPolicies, and diagnostics

items.title: Day 63 - CoreDNS Failures - When DNS Dies
items.description: Break and restore CoreDNS, test DNS resolution, caching, and diagnostics
